ProjectTitle: Stimming a Space - Creating Room for Female Neurodiversity in the Arts
InitialFeedbackHistory:
31/05/2023
Data: Please indicate that you will process personal data, working with participants is not possible without collecting their personal information and pseudonymous data is also still personal data according to the GDPR. Please register this via a PRET application and submit an intermediate DMP with the reference number upon approval: for more information and procedures see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index
Documentation: Please describe how you will document your work, will you use notebooks, codebooks, readme files; or annotation tools such as tropy?  For more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: The use of hard drives is not very secure, please use the storage guide to select a secure KU Leuven storage solution: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
